name: Blood on the Trail • VTT Art Pack
name_original: Blood on the Trail • VTT Art Pack
description:
Pack of 168 tokens and a trail map for use with Blood on the Trail in the virtual tabletop (VTT) of your choice:

  • 70 character tokens
  • 14 wagons and horse tokens
  • 84 map markers
  • Map

Artwork by Guillaume Tavernier, graphic design and layout by Fred Hicks.

Note: Not for commercial use.
